author: ianna
body:
- Moving files to reduce dependencies for Reco part
- Remove unused code

```
Geometry/HcalAlgo:
    DetectorDescription/Algorithm
    DetectorDescription/Base
    DetectorDescription/Core
    FWCore/MessageLogger
    FWCore/PluginManager
    tools/Clhepheader

Geometry/HcalCommonData:
    CondFormats/GeometryObjects
    DataFormats/HcalDetId
    DetectorDescription/Base
    DetectorDescription/Core
    FWCore/Framework
    FWCore/MessageLogger
    FWCore/ParameterSet
    Geometry/CaloTopology
    Geometry/Records
    tools/Boost
    tools/Clhepheader

Geometry/HcalEventSetup:
    CondFormats/Alignment
    CondFormats/AlignmentRecord
    DataFormats/HcalDetId
    FWCore/Framework
    FWCore/MessageLogger
    FWCore/ParameterSet
    FWCore/Utilities
    Geometry/CaloEventSetup
    Geometry/CaloGeometry
    Geometry/CaloTopology
    Geometry/HcalTowerAlgo
    Geometry/Records
    tools/Boost

Geometry/HcalSimData:

Geometry/HcalTestBeamData:
    DetectorDescription/Algorithm
    DetectorDescription/Base
    DetectorDescription/Core
    FWCore/MessageLogger
    FWCore/PluginManager
    tools/Clhepheader

Geometry/HcalTowerAlgo:
    CondFormats/AlignmentRecord
    DataFormats/CaloTowers
    DataFormats/Common
    DataFormats/DetId
    DataFormats/GeometryVector
    DataFormats/HcalDetId
    FWCore/Framework
    FWCore/MessageLogger
    FWCore/ParameterSet
    FWCore/PythonParameterSet
    FWCore/Utilities
    Geometry/CaloGeometry
    Geometry/CaloTopology
    Geometry/Records
    tools/Boost
    tools/Roofitcore
```
title: Hcal Geometry Packages Dependency Cleanup
